import React, {useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import axios from 'axios' function ProductScreen({ match }) { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function fetchProduct() { const { data } = await axios.get(`/products/${match.params.id}`) } fetchProduct() }) /* const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id) */ return (

) } export default ProductScreen
